titles.title: Rhode Island Fishermen's Fairness Act of 2021
A bill to amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to add Rhode Island to the Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council, and for other purposes.
Rhode Island Fishermen's Fairness Act of 2021

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Rhode Island Fishermen's Fairness Act of 2021
This bill adds Rhode Island to the Mid-Atlantic Fishery Management Council and increases council membership from 21 to 23 members. The council is not given authority over the fisheries in the Atlantic Ocean seaward of Rhode Island.
